meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively protective or cautious.
meanings.sent1: Her overprotectivenesses towards her children made them feel suffocated.
meanings.sent2: His overprotectivenesses towards his phone led him to buy a heavy-duty case.
meanings.sent3: The dog's overprotectivenesses of its favorite toy was both adorable and annoying.
meanings.sent4: The fortress's overprotectivenesses against intruders made it nearly impenetrable.
meanings.sent5: The overprotectivenesses of the guard dog made it the perfect protector of the house.

meanings.definition: Excessive concern for the safety and well-being of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The overprotectivenesses of the lifeguard ensured no accidents happened at the pool.
meanings.sent2: Her overprotectivenesses towards her plants resulted in a flourishing garden.
meanings.sent3: The overprotectivenesses of the security guard towards the museum artifacts was commendable.
meanings.sent4: The overprotectivenesses of the mother hen kept her chicks safe from harm.
meanings.sent5: The overprotectivenesses of the firefighter saved many lives during the fire.
